{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SmartRG |model=SR700ac |fcc_date=09/19/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Kasda |manuf_model=KW6262C |type=wireless router, dsl modem, 4G LTE router, LTE modem, |fcc_id=VW7SR700A, N7NMC7355 |ic_id=11130A-SR700A, 2417C-MC7355 |us_id=VW7DL01ASR700A |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63167V;BROADCOM(R), BCM63167VKREBG, TN1640 P40, 634773-11 P3A W; |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q128CSIG |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63167V;BROADCOM(R), BCM63167VKREBG, TN1640 P40, 634773-11 P3A W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC7354 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (USB) |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1605 P11, 568887-17 3A W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=B50212E;BROADCOM(R), B50212E, B1KMLG, TD1626 P21, 604464 1 W; |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=VDSL Analog Front End (LD/AFE);Broadcom;BCM6303;;1; ,,, Dual Channel Subscriber Line Interface Circuit (miSLIC);Microsemi;Le9642;;1; |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL2, 4G LTE modem, SIM Card slot, TR-069, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=SmartRG-XXXX, SmartRG-5G-XXXX }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|802.11ac LTE/VDSL2 Gateway}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.smartrg.com/sr700ac}} "KW6262C REV:1.1 2016.08.09" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *Kasda KW6262C - ''AC1600 Wireless Dual Band 4G LTE Router'' • [http://www.kasdanet.com/ENHCSZ/pro_view-105.html PPage] : Processor: [[Broadcom]] BCM63167 + BCM43602 + BCM53125 : ADSL/VDSL: [[Broadcom]] BCM6303 + ''Microsemi'' Le9642 : 4G: FDD-LTE Cat4 (800/900/1800/2100/2600 MHz) : 4G: TDD-LTE Cat4 (1900/2350/2500/2600 MHz) : 3G: TD-SCDMA (2010~2025, 1880~1920 MHz) : 3G: WCDMA (900/1900/2100 MHz) *[[Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC7354]] - 4G LTE Mini PCIe Card :FCC ID: [http://fccid.io/N7NMC7355 N7NMC7355] (2012-11-28) {{See also|Sierra Wireless}} Marketing materials claim one USB 2.0 port although it is not populated in pictures ===See also=== *[[ZISA V800AC-LTE]] - AC1600 VDSL2/VoIP LTE WiFi Router • [http://zisacom.com/c/default/pageId/5541dd482034da9f368b45ce/articleId/593fa6569ccde2f40c4a7810 PPage] :Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM63167 + BCM53134S (switch) :Flash: 128MB (NAND), RAM: 128MB (DDR3) :Wi-Fi: BCM63167 (2T2R 802.11bgn 2.4GHz) :::+ BCM43602 (3T3R 802.11ac 5GHz) :Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0 :LTE: [[Qualcomm]] MDM9x20 Cat4 TDD :Voice (VoIP): ''[[Microsemi]]'' LE9642 *[[ZISA V105WL]] - N300 VDSL2 WiFi Router • [http://zisacom.com/c/default/pageId/5541dd482034da9f368b45ce/articleId/5584268577eb068e6a8b4569 PPage] :Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM63381 + BCM50210 (PHY) :Flash: 16MB (NOR), RAM: 64MB (DDR) :Wi-Fi: BCM43217 (2T2R 802.11bgn 2.4GHz) :Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 2x USB 2.0 :ADSL/VDSL: [[Broadcom]] BCM6303 :Voice (VoIP): ''[[Microsemi]]'' LE9642 *[[ZISA V104WL-H]] - N300 VDSL2 WiFi Router • [http://zisacom.com/c/default/pageId/5541dd482034da9f368b45ce/articleId/5928f7d09ccde2606c6e568f PPage] :Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM63381 + BCM50212 (PHY) :Flash: 16MB (NOR), RAM: 64MB (DDR) :Wi-Fi: BCM43217 (2T2R 802.11bgn 2.4GHz) :Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x FE LAN, 2x USB 2.0 :ADSL/VDSL: [[Broadcom]] BCM6303 *[[ZISA DOCSIS 3.0]] - DOCSIS 3.0 Wireless Gateway with EMTA • [http://zisacom.com/c/default/pageId/5541dd482034da9f368b45ce/articleId/594398dd9ccde222544a7810 PPage] :Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM3383Z + BCM53124S (switch) :Wi-Fi: BCM43217T (2T2R 802.11bgn 2.4GHz) :Flash: 32MB (NOR)/1MB (NOR) + 128MB (NAND) :Memory: RAM: 128MB (DDR3) :Ports: 2x FE LAN; Power Supply: DC 12V/1A :DoCSIS 3.0, Channel Bonding: 8x4 __NOTOC__
